Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 20.10.27-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 20.10.27-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-cli is earlier than 20.10.27-2, affected by CVE-2023-48795
